Question: Shenzhen Shuo Yu Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Shuo Yu Technology Co., Ltd.

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- New 8K Ultra HD Smart TV
- Quantum Dot display technology
- Dolby Atmos sound system
- AI-powered smart features
- Integrated streaming apps
- Voice control functionality
- Slim bezel design
- Multiple HDMI and USB ports
- Wall-mountable design
